tagline.zh: 您通往巴西市场的桥梁
tagline.en: Your Bridge to the Brazilian Market

meta.description: Connecting established Chinese companies with opportunities in Brazil
meta.keywords: China, Brazil, B2B, import, export, BRICS, Canton Fair

title.zh: 您通往巴西市场的桥梁
title.en: Your Bridge to the Brazilian Market

subtitle.zh: 通过信任、专业知识和战略合作伙伴关系，将成熟的中国企业与巴西的无限机遇联系起来。
subtitle.en: Connecting established Chinese companies with infinite opportunities in Brazil through trust, expertise, and strategic partnerships.

canton_banner_text.en: 🎯 Meet us at Canton Fair! Booth 15.2 H19-20

content.zh: 促进成熟中国企业战略性进入巴西市场，建立基于互信和可持续增长的持久合作伙伴关系。
content.en: Facilitate the strategic entry of established Chinese companies into the Brazilian market, creating lasting partnerships based on mutual trust and sustainable growth.

content.zh: 成为中国和巴西之间的主要桥梁，将文化差异转化为商业机会，共建南南贸易的未来。
content.en: To be the leading bridge between China and Brazil, transforming cultural differences into business opportunities and building the future of South-South trade.

content.zh: 我们深刻理解关系的概念。我们不仅做生意——我们建立基于相互尊重、信任和互惠互利的持久关系。
content.en: We deeply understand the concept of Guanxi. We don't just do business - we build lasting relationships based on mutual respect, trust, and reciprocal benefits.

description.zh: 数字平台连接经过验证的中国供应商与合格的巴西买家。
description.en: Digital platform connecting verified Chinese suppliers with qualified Brazilian buyers.

description.zh: 商务访问、业务洽谈会和国际展会参与。
description.en: Trade missions, business rounds, and participation in international fairs.

description.zh: 全面核实公司、产品和认证，确保交易安全。
description.en: Complete verification of companies, products, and certifications to ensure safe transactions.

description.zh: 物流、文件、合规和巴西法规的全面咨询。
description.en: Complete advisory on logistics, documentation, compliance, and Brazilian regulations.

description.zh: 了解您在巴西市场的需求、产品和目标。
description.en: We understand your needs, products, and goals in the Brazilian market.

description.zh: 研究您行业的需求、竞争和具体机会。
description.en: Research on demand, competition, and specific opportunities for your sector.

description.zh: 介绍合格买家和经过验证的分销商。
description.en: We introduce qualified buyers and verified distributors in your area.

description.zh: 制定市场进入策略，建立品牌知名度，开拓新的销售渠道和客户群体。
description.en: Develop market entry strategies, build brand awareness, and expand into new sales channels and customer segments.

description.zh: 售后跟进、物流和解决文化/商业问题。
description.en: Post-sale follow-up, logistics, and resolution of cultural/commercial issues.
